description:
Sleek, high-performance insoles designed to fit trail running shoes, hiking boots and ski boots. A combination of full-length EVA foam and composite heel plates provides a secure, stable platform, delivering better shock absorption to reduce foot, ankle, knee and back pain. Blue insoles can also improve shoe fit to so you end up with less muscle fatigue after a long day on your feet.

  • Forefoot cushion pads
  • Structured heel cup provides medium support
  • Medium-profile shape supports medium width feet
  • Antimicrobial treatment
name: Superfeet All-Purpose Support Medium Arch (Blue) - Unisex
